name: Erebuni Medical Academy Foundation
description: A modern medical institution focused on innovative healthcare education in Armenia
longDescription: Erebuni Medical Academy Foundation is dedicated to training skilled healthcare professionals through a combination of theoretical knowledge and practical experience. The institution emphasizes international collaboration and modern teaching methodologies to prepare students for global medical practice.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Armenia

name: Yerevan State Medical University
description: Leading medical university in Armenia with a rich history of medical education
longDescription: Established in 1920, Yerevan State Medical University (YSMU) is the oldest and most prestigious medical institution in Armenia. With nearly a century of academic excellence, it has produced thousands of skilled medical professionals serving worldwide. The university offers comprehensive medical education with strong emphasis on clinical practice.
ranking: Top medical university in Armenia, #12 in CIS countries
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Armenia

studentLife.accommodation: University dormitories and assisted private housing

name: Yerevan Haybusak University
description: Private medical university offering medical education in multiple languages
longDescription: Yerevan Haybusak University is a progressive institution offering medical programs in Armenian, Russian, and English. With a strong focus on international education standards, the university provides students with modern facilities and international exposure through exchange programs and international faculty.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Armenia

name: University of Traditional Medicine
description: Specialized institution combining modern medical education with traditional healing practices
longDescription: The University of Traditional Medicine in Armenia offers a unique blend of conventional medical education alongside traditional Armenian and Eastern healing methods. The university focuses on holistic approaches to medicine, combining scientific research with centuries-old healing traditions.
programmes: General Medicine with Traditional Medicine (6 years)
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Armenia

name: Mkhitar Gosh Armenian-Russian International University
description: Bilateral educational institution offering medical programs with Russian collaboration
longDescription: Mkhitar Gosh Armenian-Russian International University represents strong educational cooperation between Armenia and Russia. The university focuses on providing quality medical education according to international standards while maintaining close ties with Russian medical institutions for exchange programs and joint research.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Armenia
Ministry of Education of Russian Federation
academicFacilities: Digital library with Russian medical resources

name: Orel State University
description: Comprehensive university with strong medical faculty in central Russia
longDescription: Orel State University is a major educational and scientific center in central Russia, known for its strong medical faculty. The university combines traditional Russian medical education with modern approaches, featuring extensive clinical practice and research opportunities in various medical fields.
accreditation: Ministry of Science and Higher Education of the Russian Federation

name: Bashkir State Medical University
description: Leading medical university in the Republic of Bashkortostan with extensive international programs
longDescription: Established in 1932, Bashkir State Medical University is one of Russia's premier medical institutions located in Ufa. The university has a strong tradition of medical education and research, with over 8,000 students including a large international community. BSMU offers comprehensive medical training with extensive clinical practice in its affiliated hospitals.
address: 3 Lenin Street, Ufa, Republic of Bashkortostan, Russia, 450008
ranking: Top 50 Russian universities, #5 among Russian medical universities
accreditation: Ministry of Science and Higher Education of the Russian Federation

name: Kazan State Medical University
description: Historic medical university with over 200 years of educational excellence
longDescription: Founded in 1814, Kazan State Medical University is one of the oldest medical schools in Russia with a rich history of medical discoveries and educational innovation. Located in the culturally diverse Republic of Tatarstan, the university combines traditional Russian medical education with modern international standards, attracting students from over 50 countries.
address: 49 Butlerov Street, Kazan, Republic of Tatarstan, Russia, 420012
ranking: Top 30 Russian universities, Top 3 medical universities in Russia
accreditation: Ministry of Science and Higher Education of the Russian Federation
Educational Commission for Foreign Medical Graduates (ECFMG)

name: Siberian State Medical University
description: Leading medical institution in Siberia with strong research orientation
longDescription: Siberian State Medical University in Tomsk is one of the oldest medical schools beyond the Ural Mountains, founded in 1888. The university is recognized for its strong research orientation and clinical practice, offering education in all major medical fields with emphasis on adaptation medicine for extreme conditions typical for Siberian regions.
ranking: Top 35 Russian universities, Leading medical university in Siberia
accreditation: Ministry of Science and Higher Education of the Russian Federation
academicFacilities: Center for innovative technologies in medicine

name: Georgian National University (SEU)
description: Modern private university with strong international medical programs
longDescription: Georgian National University (SEU) is a progressive private institution in Tbilisi offering international standard medical education. The university focuses on innovative teaching methods and practical skills development through modern facilities and partnerships with leading hospitals and clinics in Georgia.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Georgia

name: Alte University
description: Young innovative medical university with European education standards
longDescription: Alte University is a modern institution in Georgia focused on providing internationally recognized medical education using innovative teaching methodologies. The university maintains strong relationships with European medical schools and emphasizes practical clinical training from early years of education.
ranking: Emerging university in Georgian medical education
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Georgia
National Center for Educational Quality Enhancement

name: Batumi Shota Rustaveli State University
description: Historic university with modern medical faculty in coastal Georgia
longDescription: Located in the beautiful coastal city of Batumi, Shota Rustaveli State University is one of Georgia's oldest educational institutions with a modern medical faculty. The university offers comprehensive medical education combining Georgian traditions with international standards in a multicultural environment near the Black Sea.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Georgia

name: Ilia State University
description: Leading research university with innovative approach to medical education
longDescription: Ilia State University is one of Georgia's premier research institutions with a modern approach to medical education. The university emphasizes interdisciplinary learning, research skills development, and international collaboration, preparing students for both clinical practice and academic medicine careers.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Georgia
National Center for Educational Quality Enhancement

name: International Medical School (IMS)
description: Modern international medical school with globally oriented curriculum
longDescription: The International Medical School (IMS) in Kazakhstan is designed to provide world-class medical education with international faculty and modern teaching methodologies. The curriculum is aligned with global medical education standards, preparing students for international medical licensing examinations and global healthcare practice.
ranking: Leading international medical institution in Kazakhstan
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Kazakhstan
Independent Kazakh Agency for Quality Assurance in Education

name: Semey State Medical University
description: Historic medical university in Eastern Kazakhstan with strong clinical focus
longDescription: Semey State Medical University (formerly Semipalatinsk State Medical University) has a long history dating back to 1953. The university is known for its strong clinical training and research on environmental medicine, particularly related to the effects of nuclear testing in the region. It offers a comprehensive medical education with modern facilities and international collaborations.
address: 103 Abay Street, Semey, East Kazakhstan Region, Kazakhstan
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Kazakhstan
Independent Kazakh Agency for Quality Assurance in Education

name: South Kazakhstan State Medical Academy
description: Leading medical institution in southern Kazakhstan with rich educational traditions
longDescription: South Kazakhstan State Medical Academy in Shymkent is a major medical education center for southern Kazakhstan. The academy combines traditional medical teaching methods with modern technologies, focusing on addressing regional healthcare challenges and preparing physicians for both urban and rural practice.
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Kazakhstan
Independent Kazakh Agency for Quality Assurance in Education

name: Fergana Medical Institute of Public Health
description: Regional medical institution focused on public health education in Fergana Valley
longDescription: Fergana Medical Institute of Public Health specializes in training medical professionals with emphasis on community and public health issues relevant to the Fergana Valley region. The institute combines traditional Uzbek medical knowledge with modern international medical standards to address local healthcare challenges.
ranking: Regional leader in public health education
accreditation: Ministry of Higher and Secondary Specialized Education of Uzbekistan

name: Samarkand State Medical Institute
description: Historic medical institution in the ancient city of Samarkand
longDescription: Founded in 1930, Samarkand State Medical Institute is one of the oldest medical schools in Central Asia, located in the historic city of Samarkand. The institute offers comprehensive medical education combining rich educational traditions with modern medical technologies and practices, attracting students from many countries.
accreditation: Ministry of Higher and Secondary Specialized Education of Uzbekistan

name: Tashkent Medical Academy
description: Leading medical university in the capital of Uzbekistan
longDescription: Tashkent Medical Academy is the flagship medical institution in Uzbekistan, located in the capital city. Established in 1920, it has a long tradition of excellence in medical education, research, and clinical practice. The academy offers multifaceted medical training with strong emphasis on clinical competence and research capabilities.
accreditation: Ministry of Higher and Secondary Specialized Education of Uzbekistan
Educational Commission for Foreign Medical Graduates (ECFMG)

name: International Medical University (IMU)
description: Modern international medical university with global recognition
longDescription: International Medical University in Kyrgyzstan focuses on providing world-class medical education to both local and international students. With English as the primary medium of instruction, the university prepares graduates for international medical practice with curriculum designed to meet global standards and licensing requirements.
ranking: Leading international medical institution in Kyrgyzstan
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Kyrgyz Republic

name: Jalalabad State Medical University
description: Regional medical university serving southern Kyrgyzstan
longDescription: Jalalabad State Medical University is focused on addressing the healthcare needs of southern Kyrgyzstan while providing quality medical education to both local and international students. The university emphasizes practical clinical skills and community-oriented medical practice relevant to the region's healthcare challenges.
ranking: Leading medical institution in southern Kyrgyzstan
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Kyrgyz Republic

name: Osh State University
description: Historic university with strong medical faculty in Kyrgyzstan's southern capital
longDescription: Osh State University's Medical Faculty is one of the most established medical education centers in southern Kyrgyzstan. Located in the ancient city of Osh, the university combines traditional Central Asian medical knowledge with modern medical science, offering comprehensive medical education in multiple languages.
ranking: One of the top 3 universities in Kyrgyzstan
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Science of Kyrgyz Republic

name: Nobel Medical College
description: Modern medical institution in eastern Nepal with comprehensive facilities
longDescription: Nobel Medical College in Biratnagar is one of the premier medical institutions in eastern Nepal, offering quality medical education with state-of-the-art facilities. The college focuses on practical clinical training through its 750-bed teaching hospital while maintaining high academic standards in accordance with national and international requirements.

studentLife.accommodation: College hostels for boys and girls

name: Birat Medical College
description: Quality medical institution in Biratnagar with strong clinical emphasis
longDescription: Birat Medical College, affiliated with Purbanchal University, offers quality medical education in eastern Nepal with focus on clinical competence and community healthcare. The college features modern facilities and a dedicated teaching hospital providing students with extensive practical experience while serving the local community.

studentLife.accommodation: Separate hostels for male and female students

name: Kathmandu Medical College
description: Established medical college in Nepal's capital with excellent reputation
longDescription: Kathmandu Medical College (KMC) is a leading medical institution in Nepal's capital, affiliated with Kathmandu University. Known for its quality education and comprehensive clinical training, KMC combines academic excellence with community service through its teaching hospital and outreach programs in both urban and rural areas.

name: KIST Medical College
description: Quality medical institution in Lalitpur with community focus
longDescription: KIST Medical College, located in Lalitpur near Kathmandu, is committed to excellence in medical education with strong emphasis on social accountability and community health. The college provides comprehensive medical training with modern facilities and dedicated teaching hospital serving both educational purposes and community healthcare needs.

studentLife.accommodation: Separate hostels for males and females

name: Hong Bang International University
description: Modern international university with strong medical programs in Ho Chi Minh City
longDescription: Hong Bang International University in Ho Chi Minh City offers comprehensive medical education with international standards and partnerships. The university focuses on practical skills development through modern facilities and clinical practice opportunities while maintaining academic rigor and research capabilities.
address: 215 Dien Bien Phu Street, Ward 15, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Training of Vietnam

name: Vo Truong Toan (VTT) University
description: Private medical university in the Mekong Delta region
longDescription: Vo Truong Toan University specializes in healthcare education in Vietnam's Mekong Delta region. The university focuses on producing medical professionals to address regional healthcare needs with particular emphasis on tropical medicine and community health issues relevant to southern Vietnam.
address: Campus 1, 376 Nguyen Thai Hoc Street, Ward 5, Vinh Long City, Vietnam
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Training of Vietnam
Vietnam National University - Ho Chi Minh City System

name: Can Tho University
description: Comprehensive university with strong medical faculty in the Mekong Delta
longDescription: Can Tho University's School of Medicine offers quality medical education in Vietnam's Mekong Delta region. As part of one of Vietnam's leading universities, the medical school combines strong academic traditions with modern educational approaches, focusing on addressing the region's specific healthcare challenges.
address: Campus II, 3/2 Street, Ninh Kieu District, Can Tho City, Vietnam
accreditation: Ministry of Education and Training of Vietnam

name: Bashundhara Ad-din Medical College Dhaka
description: Modern private medical college in the capital with excellent facilities
longDescription: Bashundhara Ad-din Medical College is a premier private medical institution in Dhaka, equipped with modern facilities and dedicated teaching hospital. The college emphasizes clinical excellence through extensive practical training and maintains high academic standards in accordance with Bangladesh Medical and Dental Council requirements.
ranking: Top 10 private medical colleges in Bangladesh
accreditation: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

studentLife.accommodation: Separate hostels for male and female students
